formattedAddress: 343 W 58th St Suite #11, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 343 W 58th St Suite #11, New York, NY 10019-1108, USA

originalText.text: I have been going to Tom (Armando) for over three years now. His quality of service and knowledge / understanding of all the treatments he offers at his studio is truly unparalleled. Getting Sugared can be an intimidating experience, however Tom makes each session feel comfortable and safe for his clients. I cannot tell you how many friends of mine I have recommended to him, all of which come back raving about their experience, saying they wished they would have gone to him sooner. I myself get treated once every four weeks, and cannot imagine going without it. If you are looking to get Sugared anywhere in the New York City area, this is absolutely the best place to do it.

originalText.text: I was always interested in getting the hair in my sensitive areas removed, but I was always a bit unsure about being in such a vulnerable physical position for a very private service. Tom instantly made me feel at ease, from the very first message to the thorough and heartfelt aftercare instructions. He maintains a consistent air of professionalism in a warm and comforting way. Tom is thorough and clear in his instructions and regularly checks in to make sure all is okay. He is an absolute pleasure to talk to each session, which makes the entire experience all the more enjoyable. The results are lasting and always of the highest quality. I have been a regular customer for a little over a year and a half—I plan to keep going as long as I am in NYC!

originalText.text: The Sugar Daddy team is amazing. I went for the first time last year to prepare for a vacation but I kept coming back as part of my regular routine because of the care, professionalism and experience. While I am still a big baby when it comes to waxing, Armando talks me though it with stories and we have shared interests to keep my mind off of things. I have referred 2 friends and they love going to James. It’s really a great value for expert care.

originalText.text: I went to James for my first ever sugaring experience. I'm not going to lie; it was painful at times. But James was so gentle and knowledgeable, and the results were definitely worth the pin. It's been over three weeks since my appointment, and my sac is still incredibly smooth! I'll definitely go back.

originalText.text: James is super sweet and provided the best service in a comfortable environment.  He was informative and helpful about aftercare and management of the area as well. Armando was welcoming and super helpful with getting me in for the appointment as well!! Definitely will be booking another appointment soon.  Thanks again!!!
